tweet: Only an M.D. and a J.D. can design a universal health care plan for America.  I am both.
Lawyers know nothing about medicine, and doctors know nothing about the law.
If you wish to know the answers, follow me on twitter.
First, Americans must realize that health care is a retail business.  It is subject to the same market forces requiring consumer awareness.
If the Obama plan includes universal Medicare coverage, I can assure Americans that a primary care physician cannot meet office overhead.
